thread.title: Michelle Obama Makes 1st Big Announcement Since White House, Here’s What Her Future Holds…
thread.title_full: Michelle Obama Makes 1st Big Announcement Since White House, Here’s What Her Future Holds…

author: John S. Roberts
title: Michelle Obama Makes 1st Big Announcement Since White House, Here’s What Her Future Holds…
text:
07:22pm   
Why can’t the Obamas just fade into the sunset like the Bush’s before them? 
I get it. Barack and Michelle left the White House with a high approval rating. People love them. They’re the two greatest people in the world . 
Whatever. 
Just go away for 2017. That would be a great start. 
Unfortunately, Michelle can’t stay out of the limelight. 
She’ll be appearing on “MasterChef Junior.” 
From Conservative Tribune : 
According to Entertainment Weekly , Michelle Obama — former first lady and dedicated enemy of taco Tuesday — will be joining the show “MasterChef Junior” as a guest judge. 
“MasterChef Junior,” for the uninitiated, is a Fox cooking competition where Gordon Ramsay — a bullying celebrity chef/hyperkinetic waste of carbon and prescription amphetamines from the British Isles — berates unfortunate children for fun and profit. 
The Los Angeles Times reports that other guest judges will include Martha Stewart and a few of the Muppets. When you consider the three-year jail sentence Fozzie Bear served on a wocka-wocka-wrongful death conviction, that makes Michelle Obama the only judge mentioned to have not done prison time. 
Who can’t wait to tune in? 
Anyone?
